ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 63 - which (a) DECLARES the severe forest fires of July and August 2003, in British Columbia to be of concern to the federal government, and (b) AUTHORIZES the provision of financial assistance in that regard.
